fcb_fab_flexible_title: Aluminum PCB: Amazing Heat Dissipation, Low Prices, Industry 4.0 Manufacturing
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: PCBONLINE provides single-sided, double-sided, multilayer, and flexible aluminum PCBs for automotive, LEDs, etc. IPC-A600-3/2 Class quality. Free aluminum substrate PCB samples and only $30 per square meter for bulk orders.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: PCBONLINE is the first aluminum-based PCB manufacturer to achieve industry 4.0 manufacturing in China. Excellent 1-9W/mK thermal conductivity, mechanical flatness, and mechanical consistency.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • Aluminum PCB has good thermal conductivity and electrical insulation properties.
• Its plate is a unique group metal substrate clad copper, leading to aluminum PCB's good mechanical workability.
• Low cost - aluminum is easy and inexpensive to extract, so aluminum PCB costs less.
• Longer life - aluminum PCB is less likely to peel off, which will further extend its shelf life.
• Aluminum is not toxic, hardly causing effect on the environment without additional weight.

• Apt for various applications, such as high brightness LED lighting/backlight module, power electronics (inverter, transistor, DC/DC converter, regulator), automotive (regulator, power module), and audio (equalizer, amplifier).

fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: FPC (flexible printed circuits) is also known as a flexible PCB. Using insulating film as its material, FPC is of excellent thinness, lightness, softness, and durability.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: High-TG PCB is featured with its incomparable ability to withstand the high heat. With it, the performance of an electronic device is guaranteed as the board always supports and connects all components firmly.
